original_title: Playboy: No Boys Allowed 4 Naughty and Nice
overview: If you've ever dreamed of being a fly on the wall when some of the world's hottest girls get naughty behind closed doors, your prayers have been answered! Playboy's latest dip into their film vault uncovered some girl-on-girl footage that was way too sizzling to pass up. You won't believe your eyes as some of Playboy's sexiest Playmates - including Shannon Stewart, Playboy Playmate June 2000; Miss September 1999, Kristi Cline; Miss January 2002, Nicole Narain; and Teri Harrison, Miss October 2002 - set the cameras aflame with their mind-blowing boy-free escapades. Share in the fantasy!
title: Playboy: No Boys Allowed 4 Naughty and Nice
